AppDB.Name: SNIF_COMMAND_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents all the TM attributes of a snif command(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_COUNTING_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents all the counting attributes of a snif command(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_INGRESS_MIRROR_VID_PROFILE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the VIDs for ingress mirror(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_INGRESS_MIRROR_RULE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the pp port + VID mapping to ingress mirror profile

AppDB.Name: SNIF_EGRESS_COMMAND_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents all the TM attributes of a egress snif command(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_EGRESS_SNOOP_STRENGTH_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents all the strenght of a egress snoop command(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_EGRESS_MIRROR_VID_PROFILE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the VIDs for egress mirror(profile)

AppDB.Name: SNIF_EGRESS_PORT_TO_RCY_CHANNEL_MAP_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the pp port recycle channel ID

AppDB.Name: SNIF_EGRESS_MIRROR_RULE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the pp port + VID mapping to egress mirror profile

AppDB.Name: SNIF_SYSTEM_HEADER_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: in this table there are overlapping field mapping FTMH header construction for snif packet

AppDB.Name: SNIF_NEW_SYSTEM_HEADER_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: New system header construction for snif packet

AppDB.Name: SNIF_SYSTEM_HEADER_TABLE_LEGACY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Jericho FTMH header construction for snif packet

AppDB.Name: SNIF_MIRR_PROFILE_TO_CODE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping from mirror rule profile id to code

AppDB.Name: SNIF_CODE_TO_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping from mirror rule profile id to code

AppDB.Name: SNIF_RCY_CMD_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping recycle command to mirror/snoop code

AppDB.Name: TM_ACTION_TYPE_TO_SNIF_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping tm action type to snif
